00011 -(id)initWithTarget:(id)_target {
00012         if (self = [super init]) {
00013                 self.target = _target;
00014         }
00015         return self;
00016 }

00018 - (NSMethodSignature *)methodSignatureForSelector:(SEL)aSelector {
00019         return [target methodSignatureForSelector:aSelector];
00020 }
00021 
00022 - (void)forwardInvocation:(NSInvocation *)anInvocation {
00023         [anInvocation retainArguments];
00024         NSString *returnType = [NSString stringWithFormat:@"%s", [[anInvocation methodSignature] methodReturnType]];
00025         if (![returnType isEqualToString:@"v"]) {
00026                 [anInvocation setReturnValue:&self];
00027         }
00028         self.invocation = anInvocation; 
00029 }
00030 
00031 - (BOOL)respondsToSelector:(SEL)aSelector {
00032         return [target respondsToSelector:aSelector];
00033 }
00034 
00035 -(id)play {
00036         [invocation setTarget:target];
00037         [invocation invoke];
00038         NSString *returnType = [NSString stringWithFormat:@"%s", [[invocation methodSignature] methodReturnType]];
00039         if (![returnType isEqualToString:@"(null)"] && ![returnType isEqualToString:@"v"]) {
00040                 id value;
00041                 [invocation getReturnValue:&value];
00042                 return value;
00043         } else {
00044                 return nil;
00045         }
00046 }
00047 
00048 -(void)dealloc {
00049         self.target = nil;
00050         self.invocation = nil;
00051         [super dealloc];
00052 }
